Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394360) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394360)
